description:
“Welcome home.”

This should be a very simple sentence.

But not everyone knows that for some people, this is a sentence they will never hear nor speak.

A sentence out of reach.

＊＊＊

“I killed my mother.”

This was the first thing A-Xiao said to me when he hurriedly got into the passenger seat of the car.>
